short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alt+Shift+Click to remove element from page, Alt+Shift+RightArrow to FastForward playing video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alt+Shift+Click = Remove given element

For All currently playing videos:
Alt+Shift+Right = FastForward (Ads?)
Alt+Shift+Up = speed up by 10%
Alt+Shift+Down = slow down by 10%
Alt+Shift+Left = default playback rate
